name: Install Button
description: Transform shelter plugin links into buttons for quick install and add support for OneClick™ technology.
author: xirreal

site.longDescription: Makes installing shelter plugins even easier! Adds support for the patent-pending and trademarked OneClick™ installation technology, letting you install plugins straight from your browser. As if that wasn't enough, it also makes shelter plugin links embed in the Discord chat, adding a nice install button for quick and easy plugin sharing.
infos: This plugin is required for the OneClick™ installers to work.
